trans-unit.source: Azure portal and Azure preview portal
trans-unit.target: Azure portal and Azure preview portal

trans-unit.source: The steps in this document use the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this document use the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <link><linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <link><linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title></link>.
